ovdesc.p: This table is used to define a "virtual" customer for the wealth management application. This customer will have a number of dynamic models accosated with its portfolios.
There is a one to one relationship better portfolios and dynamic models.

desc.p: This none inputtable multi-value field relates a portfolio to a dynamic node name from AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL.
A copy of the short name field from the customer table.
This must be a valid entry in the CUSTOMER table.
This mandatory field allows the inputter to type in a short descripition fo this item.
This none inputtable multi-value field relates a dynamic node name from AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL to the corresponding portfolio.
Contains all the Override messages which the user agreed to during Input.
In the event that the user confirms the Override, the full text of the actual Override Message will be stored, for reference purposes only, in this multivalue field.
